__info_description__: Shows films and series rating from IMDB and Kinopoisk on FS.UA and EX.UA. Allows to vote in both systems in place.
playerOnly: Remove all unnecessary content from Video player page.
playerOnlySub: Only player window and season/video quality/audio stream selectors.
syncSettingsSub: All browsers with same account will use same settings.
showVotingSub: Helps you to vote in both systems in one place.
removeAdvSub: Try to remove ads from fs.to.
